name: The Way Home (itch) (RoyZhang)
description:
Title: The Way Home

Platform: PC Game 

Genre: Platformer 

Rating: E 

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

Game Overview: This is a very simple puzzle game for all ages. Everyone can find some fun in it.

 Instructions: This game uses the Key W to control the man move forward, and you have to use mouse right click the cube to drag the cube to make cube turn to help you make your man turn. If the man hits the house it will goes to the next level. The goal is to control the man hit the house.

Game Design Team 

Ruoyu Zhang – Game Designer
